special: Physical contact with one of the exiles counts as a Rot attack. {mutation}

attacks: {entangle:(6):(1):0:On a hit, the victim is snared and suffers one point of damage from the acid. To get free, the victim needs to make a `FORCE` roll (others can help, page 48). Until then, he suffers another point of damage every turn.}
{entangle:(6):1:0:Every ~success decreases the Gear Bonus of the target item by one step. The attacks continue until the ~ are destroyed or the victims manage to escape.}

{maw:0:2:0:On a hit, the ~ attaches itself to the victim and tries to drag it underground. The victim must make a `FORCE` roll (one action) to break free. In the meantime, the ~ can keep attacking the victim with its inner rings of teeth, and gets a +3 modification.}

{claws:0:1:0}|{jaws:0:3:0:Can only be used in a sneak attack (page 82). If successful, the victim is caught in the maw and must make a `FORCE` roll to break free (modification −2, but friends can help).}
{tentacles:0:1:c1:On a hit the victim is snared and must make a `FORCE` roll to get free}|{maw:0:3:0:Can only be used on a snared victime.}

special: Swarm. To get away, a victim needs to make a `MOVE` roll

attacks: Anyone who walks into the greenery must make a MOVE roll or be incapacitated by the powerful spores.
{bite:0:1:0:Any attack from ~, whether successful or not, inflicts one point for Rot on the victim.}
{bite:0:2:0:On a hit the ~ can pull its prey down under water to drown it. The victim will suffer one point of damage per turn (unless Amphibian) and must make a `FORCE` roll to break free.}

special: Swooping Attack, Lift Off, See page 181.

attacks: {engulfing attack:0:1:0:In the first turn only, the attack causes doubt instead of damage. For each point of damage that the victim suffers, the Strength of the ~ increases by one (even above its starting value).}

{bite:0:1:0:*Poison* — If the ~’s bite inflicts damage, the poison enters the victim’s body and causes one point of fatigue per turn until the victim is broken. A successful `HEAL` roll (modification −2 if attempting it on oneself) to suck the poison out will stop the process.}

special: **Pheromones:** The Strength of the swarm increases one step every turn until the victims are either dead or have escaped.
attacks: {bite:0:1:0:*Hallucinogenic Poison* — All attacks that give the victim one or more points of damage also inflicts one point of confusion.}

{bite:0:1:0:If the initial attack is successful, the ~ attach to their victim, which will suffer one more point of damage every turn until the ~ are removed. To pull or cut off the ~ from someone requires a successful `FIGHT` roll. Doing it on yourself is possible, but gives a −2 modification.}
{bite:0:1:0}|{repairs:Can repair.}|{jumper:0:0:c1:The ~ lands on its victim and clings to it.}|{cutting torch:0:0:0:On hit, causes a random critical injury. Only if the victim is grabbed.}
